entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:41 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
